adrFormatAddress: 340 E 52nd St #1a, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Hanna did an exceptional job with a difficult front tooth implant. The result was perfect - both cosmetically and functionally. Office staff is extremely professional and helpful. Dr. Hanna was available and took extra time to follow-up with me personally. Outstanding care.

text.text: Dr. Hanna did an exceptional job with a difficult front tooth implant. The result was perfect - both cosmetically and functionally. Office staff is extremely professional and helpful. Dr. Hanna was available and took extra time to follow-up with me personally. Outstanding care.

originalText.text: I recently had a dental emergency when I bit into something that I thought was soft and was shocked by a hard nut inside. Dr. Hanna made time to check it out and give me the care I needed. I was a patient of Dr. Spiegelman from the day he opened the office and I knew he would choose an excellent dentist to fill his shoes when he moved to California. The staff is wonderful too!

text.text: I recently had a dental emergency when I bit into something that I thought was soft and was shocked by a hard nut inside. Dr. Hanna made time to check it out and give me the care I needed. originalText.text:
My experience with Dr. Jablow is always fantastic!  She is not only GREAT at her craft, but she is very caring and sweet.  She always makes sure that I am comfortable and pain free.  Dr. Jablow also tries her best to accommodate my schedule because I travel in from another state.
She is truly the best in her field.  The staff is wonderful too!

text.text:
My experience with Dr. Jablow is always fantastic!  She is not only GREAT at her craft, but she is very caring and sweet.  She always makes sure that I am comfortable and pain free.  Dr. Jablow also tries her best to accommodate my schedule because I travel in from another state.
She is truly the best in her field.  The staff is wonderful too!

originalText.text: Definitely a first class group.  My family has been going to "Dr. Larry" for 30 years and to Dr. Hanna for the two or three that he's been part of the team.  The great thing about both is that they save teeth, they don't just yank them out because they can. 30 years ago I got a diagnosis from another doctor who recommended extraction of two or three teeth.  I went to Dr. Spiegelman for a second opinion and I've still got the 3 teeth!.  They are very professional and they do it with a sense of humor.  You can't go wrong with them.

text.text: Definitely a first class group.  My family has been going to "Dr. Larry" for 30 years and to Dr. Hanna for the two or three that he's been part of the team.  The great thing about both is that they save teeth, they don't just yank them out because they can. 30 years ago I got a diagnosis from another doctor who recommended extraction of two or three teeth. originalText.text: I have been going here since I moved to New York in 1987.  The team is professional, warm and caring.  Dr. Spiegelman has been my "go to" dentist for most of my adult life.  Recently Dr. Hanna has been an amazing addition.  Nothing, however, beats the great work of associates Nori and Marina who have always kept my smile wide.
